roleset.name: assign a label or attribute, careful thought or attention to something
roleset.note: REGARD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'regard' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes 29.2, 30.2. Other framed members include cite, describe, see, take. (from regard.01-v predicate notes)
REGARD-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, part 4. Based on verb entry regard.01 (from regard.01-n)

example.name: passivized
example.text: Until the collapse of this bid, [Mr. Wolf]-1 was regarded *trace*-1 as one of the nation's savviest airline executives after engineering turnarounds of Tiger International Inc. and Republic Airlines.
example.arg: Until the collapse of this bid
as one of the nation 's savviest airline executives
after engineering turnarounds of Tiger International Inc. and Republic Airlines

example.name: Args 0 & 1, within LVC
example.text: They did not take regard for countries' sovereignty.

example.name: Nominal, all args
example.text: Aristotle was explicit in his regard of phronesis as the most important of the three intellectual virtues.
example.arg: as the most important of the three intellectual virtues.
